title: Where do we find details about other champ updates?
body:
I want to find out more specific updates to champions like Syndra and Annie, but i can't find any places with those details. Anybody know where they are?
{{champion:134}} {{champion:1}}

replies.body:
various different websites that deal with PBE updates. I personally use surrender@20.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/current-pbe-balance-changes.html#mage
Also, if you want to join in on the discussion (sometimes before things are even on the PBE), head over the [Dev Corner](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner)!
If you have facebook then just search up "Surrender at 20". They always have the most updated pbe changes/updates.
